meta.name: Highlight 2
meta.tagline: IRC-like highlighting and notifications for select keywords. Based on Highlight by redstonekasi.

keywords.description: Regex is supported with `/<regex>/flags` syntax, which should be wrapped in word boundaries if necessary, e.g. `/\blemmmy\b/i`.

ignoreFocusMode.description: Higlight messages regardless of Do Not Disturb or Focus Mode
